about.mission: The website aims to bring in a centralized system that will ensure the activities in the context of an examination that can be effectively managed.This system allows students to enroll themselves into the system by registering their names or by sharing details to admin.

developer.name: Abdul Dalvi
developer.information: Develops interactice website using HTML,CSS,PHP,MySQl coped with amazing management skills

developer.name: Shrushti Bhosale
developer.information: Amazing with designs and styling of website
